attributes.action: Call for a General Election in the first quarter of 2023.
attributes.additional_details: Covid-19 has happened, an extremely rare microbiological event affecting almost every aspect of human life on earth life as we know it therefore we should have a general election in the first quarter of 2023 in order to ensure that we have a majority in government fulfilling the will of the people.
attributes.background: Call for a General Election in the first quarter of 2023.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
